use.flag: Use sys-fs/cryptsetup to support luks-encrypted rootfs
Use sys-fs/lvm2 to support LVM-based rootfs
Use sys-fs/mdadm to support MD-based rootfs
Use sys-fs/multipath-tools to support multipath-based rootfs
Use net-fs/sshfs to support sshfs-based rootfs
Use sys-boot/plymouth to support graphical boot splash
Use sys-kernel/linux-firmware and sys-firmware/intel-microcode to update CPU microcode
Use sys-fs/zfs to support ZFS-based rootfs
